scripts.dev:server: cd server && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload
scripts.build:server: cd server && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:all: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
